name: Space Dice
description:
Game developed for Kenney Jam 2019. 

Thme: Unlikely Combinations.

This games is a Turn Based Space Shooter. I combine two genres of games that is a Unlikely Combinations =D

Assets used:
- Sprites, Fonts and Sound Effects - by Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets
- Music - by MidFag : https://opengameart.org/content/hypersspace
